content.raw: I'm not able to reproduce this consistently (I'm using the commit right before the one where you removed absolute rotation snap). I've seen it a couple times but the fact that it's so inconsistent leads me to believe it's not a quaternion math or logic problem but a timing problem. Maybe protecting `mouseMoveVisStartPose` with a mutex could help, when you come back to absolute snapping.
